footer: This Website was made with React, Redux, i18n and built with Vite
elswitcher-description: Implementation of the "El Switcher" Board Game, into a web application for the Software Engineering I Course at my College. All the development was done under the SCRUM Agile Methodology. It has both a frontend and a backend application, communicated by a REST API and WebSockets.
